get_estimation_mean

get_estimation_mean.Rd

This function allows you to estimate mean variable at universe level.

get_estimation_mean(
  data = ech::toy_ech_2018,
  variable = NULL,
  by.x = NULL,
  by.y = NULL,
  domain = NULL,
  level = NULL,
  name = "estimacion"
)

Arguments

data

data frame with ECH microdata
variable

data frame column to estimate
by.x

data frame column
by.y

data frame column
domain

subpopulation reference setted as logical
level

is household ("h") or individual ("i").
name

name for the estimation new column

Value

table

Details

Disclaimer: This script is not an official INE product. Aviso: El script no es un producto oficial de INE.

Examples

# \donttest{
get_estimation_mean(variable = "pobre06", by.x = "dpto", level = "h")
